HotKeyAction.Name: Move foreground window to next screen
HotKeyAction.Description: This action will get the current foreground window and move it to the next screen. If there is only one screen, it will not move the window.

HotKeyAction.Name: Restore Window Up
HotKeyAction.Description: If the window is minimized, this action will set the window state to normal placing it in it's normal location and size. If it's in the normal state, the window will be maximized.

HotKeyAction.Name: Restore Window Down
HotKeyAction.Description: If the window is maximized, this action will set the window state to normal placing it in it's normal location and size. If it's in the normal state, the window will be minimized.

HotKeyAction.Name: Increase Opacity
HotKeyAction.Description: Increases the opacity of the foreground window by 5%.

HotKeyAction.Name: Decrease Opacity
HotKeyAction.Description: Decreases the opacity of the foreground window by 5%.

HotKeyAction.Name: Make Opaque
HotKeyAction.Description: Makes the foreground window completely visible.

HotKeyAction.Name: Stretch Window Horizontally
HotKeyAction.Description: If the foreground window is in normal position, it will stretch it's width to fill the screen. If pressed again, it will restore the width to 2 /3 of the screen.

HotKeyAction.Name: Stretch Window Vertically
HotKeyAction.Description: If the foreground window is in normal position, it will stretch it's height to fill the screen. If pressed again, it will restore the height to 2 /3 of the screen.
